import React, { Component } from 'react'; class Main extends Component { render() { return (

Add Product

{ event.preventDefault() const name = this.productName.value const price = window.web3.utils.toWei(this.productPrice.value.toString(), 'Ether') const artist_name = this.productArtist.value this.props.createProduct(name, price, artist_name) }}>
{ this.productName = input }} className="form-control" placeholder="Product Name" required />
{ this.productPrice = input }} className="form-control" placeholder="Product Price" required />
{ this.productArtist = input }} className="form-control" placeholder="Product Artist Name" required />

 

Buy Product

{ this.props.products.map((product, key) => { return ( ) })}
# Name Price Artist Owner
{product.id_product.toString()} {product.name} {product.price} {product.artist_name} {product.owner}
); } } export default Main;
